content: mystery sock kal thread can be found here 1 clues will be released on january 1st 7 14 and 21st this is a fairly simple sock pattern because like suzan says after the craziness of the holidays we need some good old simple comfort knitting so thank god it s sock day is a pattern for those lazy sunday mornings when you want to knit all morning in your pyjamas while watching a girlie movie pattern is written for magic loop or 2 circular you can use 5 dpn and placing an equal amount of stitches on 4 needles using needles 1 and 2 as the front or instep needles and using needles 3 and 4 as back/sole needles 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/barking-dog-yarns/1960101/26-50#41
